Body: Possible Duplicate:  Can I install Android on my non-Android device?  Can Android run on an iPad ?Please answer only if you are 100% sure (or even better if you tried)If yes, should I use a jailbreaker ? Could you suggest me one ?If yes, what are the limitations.. are the applications running on it without issues ?If not, why... is there a good tablet to test Android applications ?thanks
Title: Can Android run on an iPad?
